body:
This is surprising, I've played Avicus for a while but never introduced myself on the forums. Well here I am. So if you don't recognize my name right away, let me give you some clues to why you might know me.
1. You were defending Pepetheassassin from my insults towards him
2. You called me eZ so I started arguing with you
3. I called you eZ and you started arguing with me
4. You called me a pinger and we started arguing
5. The guy who gets called a hacker 24/7
6. the guy who gets the amazing kill streaks
7. The kid who fan boys pepetheassassin
8. Finally the friend of pepetheassassin
So if still don't remember it is probably due to my inactivity on the server as I was playing mostly in the summer with pepe, Blackened_Ninja and GalaxyLeviathan. Yeah and I am a small youtuber (I bet you can guess it). Yeah thats me. 
Would love to PvP you ingame, enjoy your day! Cheers.

~famian09

P.S PEPETHEASSASSIN IS BACK!!!
